name: The Gadfly of Gensokyo
description:
A spectre is haunting Gensokyo — the spectre of dialectics!

You are Diotima of Mantinea, mentor to Socrates, and you have returned from the dead to haunt a bunch of drunk Japanese girls and ask them what they think love is.

  • Non-linear, open-ended dialogue and puzzles
  • Experience the thrilling heights of Ace Attorney-inspired Socratic doubt!
  • Or... you could just possess them and make them talk to you.
  • You are a ghost after all.
  • 12,000 words (it's non-linear, you don't have to turn over every rock)

External assets used:

  • Fancy divider by GDJ
  • Athens: Acropolis by sborisov— iStock/Getty Images
  • Shrine image by 663highland
  • Abstract image by Anni Roenkae
  • Other abstract image by Johannes Plenio
